    • Method Detail

      • setImageByResId

        public static void setImageByResId(@NonNull
                                   android.app.Activity activity,
                                   @NonNull
                                   android.widget.ImageView view,
                                   @AnyRes
                                   int resId)
        Sets image to ImageView by given int resource id. The image will be scaled to fit into the ImageView, if the image is bigger, than the ImageView dimensions
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity - The activity context in which the ImageView will be attached to.
        view - ImageView - The ImageView that the drawable resource will be added to.
        resId - int - The int resource id of the drawable.
        Since:
        1.04

      • setImageByUri

        public static void setImageByUri(@NonNull
                                 android.app.Activity activity,
                                 @NonNull
                                 android.widget.ImageView view,
                                 @NonNull
                                 android.net.Uri uri)
        Sets image to ImageView by given image Uri path. The image will be scaled to fit into the ImageView, if the image is bigger, than the ImageView dimensions
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity - The activity context in which the ImageView will be attached to.
        view - ImageView - The ImageView that the drawable resource will be added to.
        uri - Uri - The Uri of the image which should be added to the ImageView.
        Since:
        1.04

      • setImageByPath

        public static void setImageByPath(@NonNull
                                  android.app.Activity activity,
                                  @NonNull
                                  android.widget.ImageView view,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String path)
        Sets image to ImageView by given image path as a String. The image will be scaled to fit into the ImageView, if the image is bigger, than the ImageView dimensions
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity - The activity context in which the ImageView will be attached to.
        view - ImageView - The ImageView that the drawable resource will be added to.
        path - String - The path of the image which should be added to the ImageView.
        Since:
        1.02

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isExternalStorageDocument

        public static boolean isExternalStorageDocument(@NonNull
                                                android.net.Uri uri)
        Checks if the authority of the Uri is an External Storage Document.
        Parameters:
        uri - Uri - The file Uri that will be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean - Returns true if is an External Storage Document, otherwise will returns false.
        Since:
        1.0
